import React, {Component} from 'react'; import './random-planet.css'; export default class RandomPlanet extends Component { state = { population: null, rotationPeriod: null, diameter: null }; render() { return (

Planet Name

Population {this.state.population}
Rotation Period {this.state.rotationPeriod}
Diameter {this.state.diameter}
) } };
